Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Display
    Class to manage the LCD display on the EV3.
    LightLocalization
    This class will provide methods to perform odometer correction using light sensors which are sampled by the LightSensorPoller thread.
    LightSensorPoller
    Runs as a thread to collect samples from all three light sensors and characterizes colour detected by middle color sensor.
    Main
    Main class to launch the program and acts as controller.
    Navigation
    Class containing all methods used to navigate EV3 about the board, uses an instance of LightLocalization class to incorporate odometry correction.
    NavigatorUtility
    Helper class with static methods used by Navigation, LightLocalization and UltrasonicLocalization classes.
    ObjectDetection
    Class to implement search and obstacle avoidance.
    Odometer
    The odometer class keeps track of the robot's (x, y, theta) position.
    Resources
    This class is used to define static resources in one place for easy access and to avoid cluttering the rest of the codebase.
    RobotClaw
    This class is used to control the claw of the robot used for the rescue process of the vehicle, it is implemented as singleton to ensure only one object of RobotClaw is created.
    UltrasonicLocalization
    The UltrasonicLocalization class implements the ultrasonic localization techniques using falling edge.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LightSensorPoller.COLOUR
    Possible color types detected by color sensor.
